mapper.select: SELECT reg_dt AS reg_dt, package_nm AS package_nm, server_type AS server_type, os_type AS os_type, device_id AS device_id, device_model AS device_model, req_url AS req_url, com_type AS com_type, com_sensitivity AS com_sensitivity, cpu_usage AS cpu_usage, sim_operator_nm AS sim_operator_nm, app_ver AS app_ver, intervaltime AS intervaltime, log_tm AS log_tm, log_type AS log_type, wait_time AS wait_time, download_time AS download_time, response_size AS response_size, request_size AS request_size FROM maxy_app_total_log WHERE reg_dt > toDateTime64('{{ start_iso }}', 3) AND log_tm_dt >= now() - INTERVAL 15 MINUTE AND log_type IN (524291, 8388612) AND intervaltime > 0 ORDER BY reg_dt
